actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the printing of a compilation of tributes by Members of the House in the Halls of Congress to commemorate the years of service of the Honorable Gerald R. Ford.

summary.text: Directs the printing as a House document of a compilation of tributes by Members of the House in the Halls of Congress, commemorating the service of the Honorable Gerald R. Ford. Directs the printing of additional copies of such document.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the printing of a compilation of tributes by Members of the House in the Halls of Congress to commemorate the years of service of the Honorable Gerald R. Ford.
